meanings.definition: A small, brimless cap worn by Jewish men as a sign of religious observance.
meanings.sent1: He always wears his kippa to the synagogue.
meanings.sent2: The rabbi placed the kippa on his head before entering the temple.
meanings.sent3: When the wind blew, his kippa flew off comically.
meanings.sent4: His kippa, like a crown, symbolized his faith and tradition.
meanings.sent5: The colorful kippa stood out in the crowd, a beacon of his beliefs.

meanings.definition: To cover or wear a kippa.
meanings.sent1: Please kippa your head before entering the sacred space.
meanings.sent2: He kippas his head out of respect for the customs.
meanings.sent3: She kippas her head quickly before the ceremony begins.
meanings.sent4: The act of kippaing his head showed his reverence for the tradition.
meanings.sent5: Kippaing his head, he felt a sense of connection to his heritage.
